s1.title: Overview
s1.p: Here will soon appear an overview of the user perspective of XSP.
The actual user documentation is available from the side-panel.

s1.title: XSP learning map
s1.p: As I find that there is enough information about XSP available (only not together), I give you a list of pointers in the sequence you should read them.

ol.li: Get Cocoon up and running. Surf to [webhost]/cocoon/slides/slides?section=4 and following. This gives you a first insight in the XSP ground idea.
Read the XSP Logicsheets page. This tells you how to use and make your own XSP logicsheets and XSP pages.
If you're still hungry for more, read the XSP Internals page. This describes how XSP's are handled internally by Cocoon.
